author: Anonymous Calc
title: Clarification on difference between R/SR/MR vs NH/NR/NMR
question:
Hello, I wanted to clarify the difference between R/SR/MR vs NH/NR/NMR.


My current understanding is that Reference, Self Reference and Mutual Reference are all concepts that're only used in labeling call graphs while the concepts Natural Helper, Natural Recursion and Natural Mutual Recursion are used in labeling it in actual code.


Would this be an accurate interpretation?
instructor_answer: R/SR/MR in the type comments but the other as you said in the actual code
